content.raw: Check out gazebo's `install_server_fixture` branch. This will build and install a server fixture library, and there is example usage in `examples/stand_alone/test_fixture`.
content.html: Check out gazebo's install_server_fixture branch. This will build and install a server fixture library, and there is example usage in examples/stand_alone/test_fixture.
